textBeforeTable: Table 3-26 Oracle WebCenter Custom Portal Template Details The following table provides key information about this template. The Oracle WebCenter Custom Portal template adds the WC_CustomPortal Managed Server. It also adds a JDBC data source for accessing the WebCenter Portal, Portlet, Activities, and MDS schemas. Oracle WebCenter Custom Portal Template WC_ORACLE_HOME/common/templates/applications/oracle.owc_discussions_template_11.1.1.jar Template JAR file and location Oracle Enterprise Manager - 11.1.1.0 Oracle JRF - 11.1.1.0 Template Dependencies Oracle WebCenter Discussion Server - 11.1.1.0 Template name and version Extension Template type Information Template Detail Table 3-25 Oracle WebCenter Discussion Server Template Details The following table provides key information about this template. The Oracle WebCenter Discussion Server template adds the WC_Collaboration Managed Server and deploys Oracle WebCenter Portal's Discussion application. It also adds a JDBC data source for accessing the Discussions schema. Oracle
textAfterTable: Oracle WebCenter Custom Services Producer Template The Oracle WebCenter Custom Services Producer template adds the WC_CustomServicesProducer Managed Server. It also adds a JDBC data source for accessing the WebCenter Portal, Activities, and MDS schemas. The following table provides key information about this template. Table 3-27 Oracle WebCenter Custom Producer Template Details Template Detail Information Template type Extension Template name and version Oracle WebCenter Custom Services Producer - 11.1.1.0 Template Dependencies Oracle WebCenter Services Producer Component Oracle WSM Policy Manager Template JAR file and location WC_ORACLE_HOME/common/templates/applications/oracle.wc_custom_services_producer_template_11.1.1.jar Oracle WebCenter Analytics Template The Oracle WebCenter Analytics template adds the WC_Utilities server and the Activities Data Source, and configures the Oracle WebCenter Portal's Analytics application and dependent templates.
